body_html: @apaszke, I was getting "Read timeout" errors. I think they were caused by longer GPU initialization on certain workers. I was able to partially mitigate this by doing a bit of warmup with Keras + Horovod training, and then switching to PyTorch. Having a larger default timeout (and/or having it configurable) would be helpful.

body: @apaszke, I was getting "Read timeout" errors.  I think they were caused by longer GPU initialization on certain workers.  I was able to partially mitigate this by doing a bit of warmup with Keras + Horovod training, and then switching to PyTorch.  Having a larger default timeout (and/or having it configurable) would be helpful.
